Name: Mash

Review Text: The food was tasty and they have a diverse drink menu. The service was friendly but not too attentive - there was one person working at the front so you should consider having more staff on a Saturday night. Other than that had a great experience and would come again.

Name: Mash
Review Text: Tasty food, great service (worth mentioning that they have tap water for free) and very big portions. Price/Value ratio is REALLY good here, one of my favourite places in Amsterdam. Don't forget to try their amazing Pad thai!
